#include <stdio.h>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
long long int max_val;
long long int a[22];
long long int sum,value,n;
using namespace std;
inline long long int backtrack(int index,long long int rem)
{
	if(index == n || max_val == 0)
		return max_val;
	if(value - (rem + a[index]) < 0)
	{
		max_val = min(max_val , max((long long int)0,value-(rem)));
		backtrack(index+1,rem);
		return max_val;
	}
	max_val = min(max_val , max((long long int)0,value-(rem+a[index])));
	backtrack(index+1,rem+a[index]);
	backtrack(index+1,rem);
	return max_val;
}
int main() {
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d %lld",&n,&value);
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
			scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
		max_val = INT_MAX;
		printf("%lld\n",backtrack(0,0));
	}
	return 0;
}
